attributes.action: explain why Britain is silent on the nuclear weapons of mass destruction held by Israel, whilst no other country in the region has such weapons? What does the Prime Minister intend to do about this situation?
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To explain why Britain is silent on the nuclear weapons of mass destruction held by Israel, whilst no other country in the region has such weapons? What does the Prime Minister intend to do about this situation?

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
